projects.title: Volunteer Management Automation
details: Problem: Volunteer data arrived via Forms and a signup tool; staff manually merged lists for four cities, introducing duplicates and inconsistent formats.

Process: Built Apps Script pipelines: on-submit mapping for Forms; scheduled ingest from the signup tool; normalization of phones/dates; dedupe by Email + First Name; role history merged; branding text synced from Docs.
Outcome: City rosters auto-update in Sheets with clean, consistent rows. Admin hours/month reclaimed; fewer duplicates; easier event readiness.
projects.diagramAlt: Diagram showing Forms and signup tool flowing into Apps Script and city Sheets

projects.title: Client Intake Automation (Anonymized)
details: Problem: Intake info was retyped into a CRM and file system; naming was inconsistent and notifications were missed.
Process: Standardized a single intake form; scripted a CRM create/update; auto-created client folders with consistent names; triggered templated emails to stakeholders.
Outcome: Intake time cut from ~45 → <10 minutes; fewer errors; team sees the same data and files immediately.
projects.diagramAlt: Diagram showing Intake form to CRM with outputs to folders and emails

projects.title: Finance Dashboard Automation (Anonymized)
details: Problem: Monthly reporting was assembled by hand across exports; categories were inconsistent and visibility lagged.
Process: Connected accounting API to a transformation layer; normalized categories; synced a metrics sheet powering dashboards.
Outcome: Live dashboards in Sheets; month-end close faster; fewer categorization errors and clearer trends.
projects.diagramAlt: Diagram showing Accounting system to Automation logic to Google Sheets dashboards
